name: CodeColorer TinyMCE Button
author: Nick Remeslennikov

sections.description:
This plugin was developed for another plugin – CodeColorer (https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/codecolorer/), but easily can be rewrited to another syntax highlighting plugin.

I don’t know why, but not one plugin for syntax highlight haven’t own button on TinyMCE panel.

NOTE: It is important that folder of plugin was named as “codecolorer-tinymce-button”
sections.installation:
1. Install CodeColorer (https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/codecolorer/)
  2. Upload plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Use new button in TinyMCE panel
sections.changelog:
0.2

  • Just reminding that i’m still alive

0.1

  • First public release
